benefits: Financial assistance for building or buying a pucca house
description_simple: The government helps eligible citizens to build or buy a house by giving financial support.

benefits: Free LPG gas connection for women from poor families
description_simple: This scheme provides free gas connections to women from poor households for clean cooking.

benefits: ₹6000 per year financial support to farmers
description_simple: The government gives farmers ₹6000 every year to help with farming expenses.

scheme_name: National Social Assistance Programme (Old Age Pension)
benefits: Monthly pension for senior citizens from poor families
description_simple: Senior citizens from low-income families receive a monthly pension for financial support.

benefits: High interest savings scheme for girl child education and marriage
description_simple: This scheme helps parents save money for their daughter's education and future.

scheme_name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
benefits: Guaranteed 100 days of wage employment in rural areas
description_simple: This scheme provides guaranteed employment to rural households for livelihood support.

benefits: Zero-balance bank account with insurance and overdraft facility
description_simple: This scheme helps citizens open a bank account with zero balance and basic banking benefits.
This scheme provides low-cost accidental insurance to citizens.

scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY)
description_simple: This scheme offers affordable life insurance to support families in case of death.
This scheme protects farmers from crop losses due to natural disasters.

benefits: Monthly pension for persons with disabilities
description_simple: This scheme provides financial support to persons with disabilities.
This scheme helps youth learn new skills and improve job opportunities.
This scholarship supports students from poor families to continue education.

benefits: Cash assistance for pregnant and lactating women
description_simple: This scheme supports pregnant women with financial assistance for health and nutrition.

scheme_name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)
benefits: Skill training and placement for rural youth
description_simple: This scheme provides skill training and job placement for rural youth.
